"POV (point of view): Marketing in Dubai," a text insert on the clip read.

articles.title: Vicky Kaushal reacts after Kusha Kapila and Srishti Dixit try to recreate his dance steps from Tauba Tauba song. Watch - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Vicky Kaushal and Tripti Dimri dance in the original song Tauba Tauba. It is from their upcoming film Bad Newz. | Bollywood
articles.content: Influencers Kusha Kapila and Srishti Dixit tried to recreate actor Vicky Kaushal's dance moves in his latest hit song, Tauba Tauba. Taking to Instagram on Friday night, the duo shared a joint post of… [+2620 chars]
